item.title: I Believe I Can Fly
item.description: [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/we_shall_destroy.md#charge-with-force-break-their-ranks-vyl-wnanory|I used to think that I could not go on]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/we_shall_destroy.md#charge-with-force-break-their-ranks-vyl-wnanory|And life was nothing but an distrustful song]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/we_shall_destroy.md#charge-with-force-break-their-ranks-vyl-wnanory|But now I know the meaning of true love]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/we_shall_destroy.
